summary: A simple re-texture of all dragon priest masks and hoods that makes them look somewhat meaner
descriptionHtml:
Replaces the default Dragon Priest mask textures with Larger, Modified versions

Changes compared to Vanilla:
Mask & Hood Textures

NOTE: Photos provided make use of custom bump maps which are not my own and thus cannot be included in the download


*****************************************************************************
Using the Nexus Mod Manager is highly recommended.
*****************************************************************************

Manual Install:
Extract the archive in your Skyrim Installation folder

Manual Uninstall:
Delete the folder dragonpriesthelm in ../Data/textures/armor

****************************************************************************
Redistribution with or without further editing is prohibited without my prior consent.
*****************************************************************************
